blur.description: Fires the moment that the element loses focus.

change.description: Fires the moment when the value of the element is changed.

focus.description: Fires the moment when the element gets focus.

select.description: Fires after some text has been selected in an element.

submit.description: Fires when a form is submitted.

keydown.description: Fires when a user is pressing a key.

args.name: e
args.description: Fires when a user presses a key.

keypress.description: Fires when a user is pressing a key.

keyup.description: Fires when a user releases a key.

click.description: Fires on a mouse click on the element.

dblclick.description: Fires on a mouse double-click on the element.

mouseout.description: Fires when the mouse pointer moves out of an element.

mouseover.description: Fires when the mouse pointer moves over an element.

innerHTML.description: The display text of the area.

cols.description: Specifies the visible width of a text area.

rows.description: Specifies the visible number of lines in a text area.

disabled.description: Specifies that a text area should be disabled.

readonly.description: Specifies that a text area should be read-only.

name.description: Specifies a name for a text area.

required.description: Specifies that a text area is required/must be filled out.

autofocus.description: Specifies that a text area should automatically get focus when the page loads.

wrap.description: Specifies how the text in a text area is to be wrapped when submitted in a form.

valueOptions.name: soft
valueOptions.description: The text in the textarea is not wrapped when submitted in a form.

valueOptions.name: hard
valueOptions.description: The text in the textarea is wrapped (contains newlines) when submitted in a form. When "hard" is used, the cols attribute must be specified.

lang.description: Specifies the language of the element's content.

spellcheck.description: Specifies whether the element is to have its spelling and grammar checked or not.

style.description: Specifies an inline CSS style for an element.

title.description: Specifies extra information about an element.

translate.description: Specifies whether the content of an element should be translated or not.
